alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 11:30AM MST until July 28 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Yavapai County in west central Arizona... * Until noon MST. * At 1130 AM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Prescott Valley, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chino Valley, Prescott Valley, Prescott, Yavapai County Fairgrounds, Downtown Prescott, Prescott Airport, Prescott Gateway Mall, Prescott Valley Event Center, and Lynx Lake Dam. This includes the following highways... State Route 89 between mile markers 311 and 326. State Route 89A between mile markers 318 and 330. State Route 69 between mile markers 285 and 296. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
